tool.name: tklastn
tool.description: Search translated nucleotide database with protein query sequence(s)
tool.command: ## The command is a Cheetah template which allows some Python based syntax. ## Lines starting hash hash are comments. Galaxy will turn newlines into spaces Klast.sh -p tplastn -i "$query" @KLAST_DB_SUBJECT_NUCL@ @BASIC_PARAMS@ -e $evalue_cutoff -o "$output1" -outfmt 2 #if $ext_param.ext_param_selector=="extended": $ext_param.filter_query -M $ext_param.matrix $ext_param.gap_costs #end if #if $config_param.config_param_selector=="advanced": -a $config_param.nb_threads -max-database-size $config_param.max_db_size -seeds-use-ratio $config_param.percent_seed -s $config_param.ungap_threshold_prot -n $config_param.ungap_neighboors -g $config_param.smallgap_threshold -b $config_param.smallgap_bandwidth #end if
